column2: Downloads of Calm mobile app worldwide from 1st quarter of 2018  to 3rd quarter 2023 (in millions)

column5: In the third quarter of 2023, meditation and mental wellness app Calm amassed a little over 1.95 million downloads worldwide. Calm, which was launched in 2012, proposes to guide users into improving their health and mental wellness with seven-day long programs, daily highlights, and stories to help users sleep among other features. In the second quarter of 2020, Calm reached over 9.5 million downloads worldwide.

column3: Google Play and Apple App Store
